title: Composite microarc oxidation coatings containing Cu on titanium alloy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32602-32612
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06194B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zaiqiang Feng, Chenxi Li, Chang Xin, Zhengquan Jiang, Zhenwei Yan, Wen Wang, Ningning Li, Zhaojun Tan, Mingqi Tang
A soft and hard composite MAO coating containing Cu was prepared on the titanium alloy by adding Cu particles to the electrolyte. Due to the excellent plasticity of Cu, the friction properties of Cu-containing MAO coating were enhanced.
